verses.verse: Thinkest <WH2803> thou this to be thy right <WH4941>, Or sayest <WH559> thou <WH6664>, My righteousness is more than God <WH410>'s,
That thou sayest <WH559>, What advantage <WH5532> will it be unto thee <WH3276>? And, What profit shall I have <WH2403>, more than if I had sinned?
I will answer <WH7725> thee <WH7453>, And thy companions with thee.
Look <WH5027> unto the heavens <WH8064>, and see <WH7200>; And behold <WH7789> the skies <WH7834>, which are higher than thou <WH1361>.
If thou hast sinned <WH2398>, what effectest <WH6466> thou against him <WH6588>? And if thy transgressions be multiplied <WH7231>, what doest thou unto him <WH6213>?
If thou be righteous <WH6663>, what givest <WH5414> thou him <WH3947>? Or what receiveth he of thy hand <WH3027>?
Thy wickedness <WH7562> may hurt a man <WH376> as thou art <WH6666>; And thy righteousness may profit a son <WH1121> of man <WH120>.
By reason of the multitude <WH7230> of oppressions <WH6217> they cry out <WH7768>; They cry <WH2199> for help by reason of the arm <WH2220> of the mighty <WH7227>.
But none saith <WH559>, Where is God <WH433> my Maker <WH6213>, Who giveth <WH5414> songs <WH2158> in the night <WH3915>,
Who teacheth <WH502> us more than the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>, And maketh us wiser <WH2449> than the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>?
There they cry <WH6817>, but none giveth answer <WH6030>, Because <WH6440> of the pride <WH1347> of evil men <WH7451>.
Surely God <WH410> will not hear <WH8085> an empty <WH7723> cry <WH7706>, Neither will the Almighty regard it <WH7789>.
How <WH637> much less when thou sayest <WH559> thou beholdest <WH7789> him not <WH1779>, The cause is before <WH6440> him <WH2342>, and thou waitest for him!
But now <WH6485>, because he hath not visited in his anger <WH639>, Neither doth he greatly <WH3966> regard <WH3045> arrogance <WH6580>;
Therefore doth Job <WH347> open <WH6475> his mouth <WH6310> in vanity <WH1892>; He multiplieth <WH3527> words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge <WH1847>.
